One donut have 1000 m/s dV - it is enough to get in Mun orbit from surface. (also Eeloo, Dres, Pol, Bop, Minmus and Gilly). Two donuts with LV24-77 have 1450 m/s dV and TWR to get in orbit from Vall, Moho and Duna. For For Tylo you need also FL-T200 tank and LV24-77. For Laythe and Kerbin replace 27-77 with turbojet and add two intakes (for better result discard oxidiser from FL tank before takeoff).

I use small octoprobe and click "control from here" on it. (Power source in not needed when Kerbal is in seat)

Also, it can be much more compact (fiddle with top and bottom connection nodes. In my example Ant protrudes only slightly from octoprobe, which bottom is in line with donut bottom, and Kerbal seating right on the Ant. Decoupler connected fancily too, making whole donut fitting very nicely on top of landing can or FL-T tank.)
